requestBody.description:
# Body description queries:

**name** - string, user name.

**email** - string, mail address. 

**password** - string, user password.

201.description:
**New User Registered** 

 Request body description : 

**user** - object, User information. 

 **code** - status code 

 **message** - status message

404.description: Not Found (requested resource could not be found)

409.description: Conflict (user with stated email is already exist)

200.description:
**Successful operation**

Responce body description:

**code** - status code

**message** - status message.

**token** - string, unique token

**user** - object, Consist: name, email, theme, avatarURL.
